subject: Re: Website Changes | RAM Equipment
preview: Hi Xavier, Understood. I can confirm that all is functioning as expected. Again, the offer stands if you need a hand with any specific data sets.

full_threads.body:
Hi Xavier, 

Understood. I can confirm that all is functioning as expected. Again, the offer stands if you need a hand with any specific data sets.

No that's alright,

I was just curious to know if something went wrong.

Heath has told me before that when it gets to the new year some apps refresh for payment and have to re-enter tokens to connect as an example.

Kind regards,

Xavier Bauwmans MARKETING COORDINATOR



P: +61 8210 4000
M: 08 8210 4000
A: 181 Richmond Road, Richmond SA 5033





Confidentiality disclaimer: Emails contain sensitive information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not disclose any information. Notify us immediately and delete the corresponding email.

Hi Xavier, 

If having the data visible via rank math pro upon logging in is a priority, I can ask the devs to work on resolving the issue. 

Alternatively, if you are looking for a specific piece of information/data, we can help you find it in Google Analytics. 

Please let me know your preference.

Thanks for that Chris,

Was this a change along the way?

I remember we used to have it showing on the home page when you log into WordPress.

The analytics show that prior to November last year we had all the information flowing through Math Rank on the website.

Kind regards,

Xavier Bauwmans MARKETING COORDINATOR



P: +61 8210 4000
M: 08 8210 4000
A: 181 Richmond Road, Richmond SA 5033





Confidentiality disclaimer: Emails contain sensitive information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not disclose any information. Notify us immediately and delete the corresponding email.

Hi Xavier, 

Absolutely. I presume you are referring to the stats presented by Rank Math upon logging in? If so, all is performing as expected (screenshot 1). 

We predominantly use Rank Math for on-page SEO and redirections. For anything related to website analytics, we use Google Analytics (screenshot 2). You will notice that all traffic is being monitored. 

Please let me know if you have any further questions

Perfect,

Thanks for those changes. Could I get you to have a look at one more thing? Our SEO plugin (Rank Math) on the website is showing no new details since November 2022.
Analytics ‹ RAM Equipment - WordPress

Kind regards,

Xavier Bauwmans MARKETING COORDINATOR

M: 08 8210 4000
A: 181 Richmond Road, Richmond SA 5033

Hi Xavier, 

Thanks for the screenshot. We have adjusted the view to remove the 3rd time "buy used" altogether. In the event the updates are not visible, clearing your cache should help.

Hi @chris updates completed

✅ 3 Columns will only show on mobile

✅ Tablet view, 3 columns hide


Time: +5mins @ricaV2
@jaime when you get a moment, can you please check out the RAM homepage? There seems to be a double up on elements when scaling from desktop to tablet view...

Confidentiality disclaimer: Emails contain sensitive information. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not disclose any information. Notify us immediately and delete the corresponding email.

Hi Xavier, 

Likewise, I hope you had an awesome weekend!

Thanks for your patience. When convenient, can you please check out the home page/main menu and let us know your thoughts? https://ramequipment.com.au/

To achieve the desired goal of reducing the "stacking effect" on smaller resolution screens, we have:

1. Relocated "Product Guide" and "FAQs" to be found under the about menu item
2. Adjusted the header settings 

For reference, our target width is 1300p before "stacking" takes place. A 1080p monitor is 1920 wide.

Hi Xavier,

Hope you are doing well. 

Sorry for the delay. This is to notify you that we received your request and we are already working on it. 

We will get back to you as quickly as possible.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

I hope you had a great weekend!

I have noticed a change in our website header with one of the buttons (Contact Button) moving to the second row in turn making the navigational bar double the thickness. Given this may be an automatic adjustment, is there any way to solve this issue moving forward?

Kind regards,

Xavier Bauwmans
